attributes.action: Conduct a referendum, immediately, to find out what the people of this country considers the most important topic at the moment.
attributes.additional_details: Commentators are being put up by Camerclegg to defuse the EU referendum issue by saying that Europe is NOT the most important issue for the people of this country.  I speak to hundreds of people every day for whom Europe is the most important issue.  We are being subjected to political manipulation AGAIN so we need a referendum on this question to demonstrate the truth of the matter.
